item.title: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Honey
item.description: Tennessee Honey is a whiskey and honey liqueur that is authentically Jack Daniels. Created to invite new consumers into the brand, it delivers naturally sweet notes for a taste that's easy to drink.

item.title: BHSAD+DCN: Students Challenge
item.description: Designcollector Network (St.Petersburg) and British Higher School of Art and Design (Moscow) challenged New Media course students to come up with an idea over digital culture perception. Over 60+ selected artworks starts a new series of DCN+BHSAD students collaborations.
item.content:encoded: Designcollector Network (St.Petersburg) and British Higher School of Art and Design (Moscow) challenged New Media course students to come up with an idea over digital culture perception. Over 60+ selected artworks starts a new series of DCN+BHSAD students collaborations.

item.title: ICG - branding
item.description: Times are changing, always and everywhere. 25 years the ICG Integrated Consulting Group is working with companies in Central and Eastern Europe to realise sustainable change. In 2011 the brand ICG Integrated Consulting Group was ready for a change too. The new corporate design conveys the consultant's identity, its corporate values and goals: distinction and autonomy. The hand-drawn graphics based on flip-chart presentations are a symbol of the fresh ideas and solutions that are developed in workshops. Corporate branding and design by moodley brand identity. CREDITS: Client: ICG Integrated Consulting Group Creative direction: Mike Fuisz Art direction und graphic design: Kurt Glänzer Director Digital: Birgit Taucher Client service: Angela Pilz Publishing: Nina Prehofer Photography: Marion Luttenberger, Winni Wintermeyer, jock + scott
item.content:encoded: Times are changing, always and everywhere. 25 years the ICG Integrated Consulting Group is working with companies in Central and Eastern Europe to realise sustainable change. In 2011 the brand ICG Integrated Consulting Group was ready for a change too. The new corporate design conveys the consultant's identity, its corporate values and goals: distinction and autonomy. The hand-drawn graphics based on flip-chart presentations are a symbol of the fresh ideas and solutions that are developed in workshops. Corporate branding and design by moodley brand identity. CREDITS: Client: ICG Integrated Consulting Group Creative direction: Mike Fuisz Art direction und graphic design: Kurt Glänzer Director Digital: Birgit Taucher Client service: Angela Pilz Publishing: Nina Prehofer Photography: Marion Luttenberger, Winni Wintermeyer, jock + scott

item.title: KENYA
item.description: Diego Arroyo is an art director and passionate photographer based in Amsterdam. He travels the world in search of the subtle: a smile, a wink of complicity, that special look that reveals our true and intimate essence. His challenge is trying to catch the story behind the eyes of strangers, the underlying magic that deserves to be seen and usually remains unnoticeable. Diego is open for new and challenging assignments so don't hesitate to drop him a line at arroyodiego@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Diego Arroyo is an art director and passionate photographer based in Amsterdam. He travels the world in search of the subtle: a smile, a wink of complicity, that special look that reveals our true and intimate essence. His challenge is trying to catch the story behind the eyes of strangers, the underlying magic that deserves to be seen and usually remains unnoticeable. Diego is open for new and challenging assignments so don't hesitate to drop him a line at arroyodiego@gmail.com

item.title: Dance with me (26 choreographic micro-pieces)
item.description: Dance with me is an alphabet based on 26 choreographic micro-pieces. Long-exposure photography reveals each letter, invisible to the naked eye.
item.content:encoded: Dance with me is an alphabet based on 26 choreographic micro-pieces. Long-exposure photography reveals each letter, invisible to the naked eye.

item.title: White Box
item.description: It is a work made as the visual identity of architects office Sturdy Style. Their corporate identity is home creating without stereotype. The architect faces the white box symbolizing a home, and designs harmony between the life and the environment. By using CG, we can see his imagination graphically. Finally he creates the ideal home with his sincere desire.
item.content:encoded: It is a work made as the visual identity of architects office Sturdy Style. Their corporate identity is home creating without stereotype. The architect faces the white box symbolizing a home, and designs harmony between the life and the environment. By using CG, we can see his imagination graphically. Finally he creates the ideal home with his sincere desire.

item.title: Salsa Invertebraxa (A Graphic Novel) - Part II
item.description: Salsa Invertebraxa is a new graphic novel charting the odyssey of two invertebrate companions who journey through a strange and vibrant world of imaginary insects and flora.

item.title: EKKO Recordings 1986 - 2011
item.description: EKKO Recordings 1986 - 2011 25 years of music in EKKO EKKO is a venue in Utrecht (NL) and is celebrating its 25th anniversary in 2011. And what better way to celebrate this moment than to record all the beautiful music history that is written in EKKO and also the authenticity and quality that EKKO stands for with the release of special anniversary vinyl. Under the name of EKKO RECORDINGS, the venue will release 2 vinyl records containing some of the highlights of the past 25 years. The vinyl comes in two parts: the period from 1986 to 1998 and from 1998 to 2011. What's special about this project is that it is both crowdfunded as well as crowdsourced. The vinyl is not only financially made possible by donors, the content is determined by the public and donors as well. Through the EKKO website people can vote on the highlights of these periods. The voice of supporters double-counts and so they have more influence on the final composition. The pattern on the recordsleeve is created by hammering black carpet nails into layered black foamboard and wood. The pattern is produced by white sewing thread between the nails. The total amount of nails used per design is 1800 per recordsleeve, so over 3600 nails were uses to create both designs.
item.content:encoded: EKKO Recordings 1986 - 2011 25 years of music in EKKO EKKO is a venue in Utrecht (NL) and is celebrating its 25th anniversary in 2011. And what better way to celebrate this moment than to record all the beautiful music history that is written in EKKO and also the authenticity and quality that EKKO stands for with the release of special anniversary vinyl. Under the name of EKKO RECORDINGS, the venue will release 2 vinyl records containing some of the highlights of the past 25 years. The vinyl comes in two parts: the period from 1986 to 1998 and from 1998 to 2011. What's special about this project is that it is both crowdfunded as well as crowdsourced. The vinyl is not only financially made possible by donors, the content is determined by the public and donors as well. Through the EKKO website people can vote on the highlights of these periods. The voice of supporters double-counts and so they have more influence on the final composition. The pattern on the recordsleeve is created by hammering black carpet nails into layered black foamboard and wood. The pattern is produced by white sewing thread between the nails. The total amount of nails used per design is 1800 per recordsleeve, so over 3600 nails were uses to create both designs.

item.title: OLIVES
item.description: OLIVES : is a graphic design work and make a pattern on the fabric for the girl group in Thailand. Main concept is to reflects the identity of the 4 girls by making the appearance,the height :a leg and their habits :brightness,cheerful from young heart to used in the design.
item.content:encoded: OLIVES : is a graphic design work and make a pattern on the fabric for the girl group in Thailand. Main concept is to reflects the identity of the 4 girls by making the appearance,the height :a leg and their habits :brightness,cheerful from young heart to used in the design.

item.title: Intrinsic Nature: Experiment 11
item.description: Returning once again after our 10th successful exhibition, Intrinsic Nature and our core of artists is proud to present the 11th Experiment, filled with a multitude of artistic styles, diverse photography, and engaging music. Headlined by newcomers Finnian MacManus, Johnston Ting, and Roy Hessels, IN11 showcases 72 works of art created by 49 international artists. Immerse yourself in the momentit starts now.
item.content:encoded: Returning once again after our 10th successful exhibition, Intrinsic Nature and our core of artists is proud to present the 11th Experiment, filled with a multitude of artistic styles, diverse photography, and engaging music. Headlined by newcomers Finnian MacManus, Johnston Ting, and Roy Hessels, IN11 showcases 72 works of art created by 49 international artists. Immerse yourself in the momentit starts now.
